item.title: Nanci add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The story so far: In the beginning the Universe was created. This has made a lot of people very angry and been widely regarded as a bad move." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "If you can't fly then run, if you can't run then walk, if you can't walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Never, never be afraid to do what's right, especially if the well-being of a person or animal is at stake. Society's punishments are small compared to the wounds we inflict on our soul when we look the other way." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Margaret Mead
item.description: "Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed, citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has." -- Margaret Mead

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "There comes a time when silence is betrayal." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Wars are poor chisels for carving out peaceful tomorrows." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "the time is always right to do the right thing" -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "A right delayed is a right denied." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Be The Peace You Wish To See In The World!" -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "What affects one in a major way, affects all in a minor way." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "One has a moral responsibility to disobey unjust laws." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Martin Luther King, Jr.
item.description: "We shall overcome." -- Martin Luther King, Jr.

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Hate destroys the hater..." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Right, temporarily defeated, is stronger than evil triumphant." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Nanci add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "At the center of non-violence stands the principle of love" -- Martin Luther King Jr.
